title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, May 1, 2020
description: “I'm out of it, but not too far out. I figure somewhere between 12 to 18 inches.” –Louis Jenkins (1942-2019), from today’s featured poem
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “I'm out of it, but not too far out. I figure somewhere between 12 to 18 inches.” –Louis Jenkins (1942-2019), from today’s featured poem
